translations: v.抽取……的试样；品尝，体验；节录，选录（sample 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: 12% of the children sampled said they prefer cats to dogs.
sentences.translation: 在被抽样调查的孩子中，12%说他们喜欢猫胜过喜欢狗。

sentences.sentence: They sampled managers as well as team members.
sentences.translation: 他们对管理人员和团队成员进行了抽样调查。

sentences.sentence: The children sampled spent a quarter of their rapidly decreasing "free time" watching television.
sentences.translation: 被抽样调查的儿童把他们迅速减少的“空闲时间”的四分之一都花在了看电视上。
